channel.title: Item Deleting. Help Please!
channel.description:
Well somehow, nearlly all of my players have got a Party hat, either wearing it, in their inventory or in their bank. None of my admins have dropped them as ive checked command logs.
Theres over 1,800 People have a partyhat out of 4,600 Accounts.
I was wondering if theirs any program I can use To delete an Item. Say i put the item id in, then it deletes it in their character Folder.
I really can NOT be bothered searching through 1,800 Accounts and deleting 1 by 1.
Please Help Guys!
-wwe4eva

item.title: Item Deleting. Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

I only want to delete certain items. I have economy reset, i really dont want to upset my other 2,600 Players.

Anyone else got any help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 17, 2009, 03:41:30 am[/size][hr]BUMP. Anyone else got any help ?!?!!?

Read full topic

item.title: Item Deleting. Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Economy reset program, it deletes all items in banks and inventory’s, but there isn’t a use in using this if you don’t know the problem, Fix duping or find the source code that gives them out.

Read full topic
